name: Arena Derby
description:
Enjoy the world of destruction with Arena Derby!

Breathtaking battles, unique arenas and bosses, lots of modes and different cars won't leave anyone indifferent!

Some of the awesome features of this game:
- Unique battle system
- Easy control
- Realistic, detailed model of damages
- A powerful artificial intelligence of opponents
- Upgradable car
- 2 Game Modes + BOSS Mode
- Different unique arenas
- Different weather conditions
- Amazing graphics and effects

Quickly take the car and go to smash!
